content.raw:
Derek,

After you clone [tunnel\_circuit](#!/osrf/subt/branch/tunnel_circuit) branch, you need to switch that branch \(see below\). I just updated the tutorial page with that info. Sorry about that.

`hg clone #!/osrf/subt/branch/tunnel_circuit`  
`cd ~/subt_ws/src/tunnel_circuit`  
`hg update -c tunnel_circuit`

Then, run `catkin_make install` again.
content.html:
Derek,

After you clone tunnel_circuit branch, you need to switch that branch (see below). I just updated the tutorial page with that info. Sorry about that.

hg clone #!/osrf/subt/branch/tunnel_circuit
cd ~/subt_ws/src/tunnel_circuit
hg update -c tunnel_circuit

Then, run catkin_make install again.
